settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

At  Ailsa's, we believe that everyone deserves to look and feel their best, and we are dedicated to providing you with the best possible hair experience. If you have any problems with your purchase, please feel free to contact us at 【hello@ailsas.com】. We will make it our priority to respond to customer inquiries within 2 working days.

settings.heading: Order Cancellation
settings.text:
If you wish to cancel your order, please reach out to our Customer Care team within one hour of placing the order. CANCEL MY ORDER.

Please note that we are not able to process cancellation once the order has been shipped.

settings.heading: Order Returns
settings.text:
We are happy to accommodate exchanges and returns for unused wigs within 30 days of purchase. To be eligible for a return or exchange, the wig must be in its original condition, with the hair uncut, unbleached, the color must be unchanged, and the lace must remain untouched (without any cutting or trimming).NEED TO RETURN.

Please note that wigs are personal items that come into direct contact with the scalp. For reasons of hygiene and customer safety, we are unable to accept returns of any wigs that have been worn or used.If you wish to return an eligible item, please contact our customer service team in advance to obtain the correct return address. Unauthorised returns will not be accepted and will not qualify for a refund.

settings.title: Return Initiate
settings.text: Contact our Customer Care team within 30 days of receiving your order to initiate the return. Providing additional details such as the reasons for returning and any relevant pictures will allow us to accept and process your return!

settings.title: request is approved.
settings.text: Our representative will provide the return address after your return request is approved.

settings.title: Refund Require
settings.text: We will process your refund within 3~10 working days after we have received and inspected your returned item. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method used for the purchase.

settings.heading: Order Exchanges
settings.text:
If you would like to exchange your item for a different item, please follow the same return process as described above. Our representative will confirm the product you would like to exchange for and assist you with any necessary payment adjustments after your exchange request is approved. Once we receive your returned item, we will process the exchanges and ship the new item to you within 5 working days.

Please note that for exchanges, we will cover all shipping costs associated with the return and reshipment.

settings.heading: Refund Processing Time
settings.text:
Refunds are typically processed within 3 to 10 business days, but please allow up to 10 business days as per our policy.

*Refunds will be issued through the original payment channel. If the card used for the purchase has expired or is no longer valid, please contact the card issuer for assistance.
